survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personal Stylist Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on AI-powered personal stylist applications to understand satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal stylist app?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity. Consider adding a 'Not Applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal stylist app?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most valuable in an AI-powered personal stylist app? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown only to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format. Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for elaboration.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with a Likert scale. This helps gauge Net Promoter Score (NPS).
